txt.en: The Máttugard entrance to the Orc-infested Deepscrave is an overlook high above a deep chasm.
Talk to Hetbrúda near Deepscrave in Máttugard
This is a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> out into the Deepscrave
The upper level of the Deepscrave is not full of Orcs
The overlook to Deepscrave can be found in the southern edge of Máttugard.\n\nYou should scout the edges of Máttugard and destroy any Orc warning totems that you find.
'There are not as many Orcs at the edge of the Deepscrave as I thought there would be, [placeholder]. Perhaps we misread those orders after all.'
Hetbrúda can be found near the entrance to Deepscrave in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Hetbrúda.
Destroy Orc warning totems in Máttugard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed Orc warning totems in Máttugard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'I have spoken with Lóssi and he thanked us for our assistance fending off the attackers. I wonder if perhaps we were to blame? Did we accidentally lead the attackers to Imrêkh-guthlu? It is possible those Orc-orders were only talking about dwarves in general and not a specific outpost. If only the hand-writing had been better!\n\n'Either way I would like to assist Lóssi further and patrol the entrance to Deepscrave for him. Would you like to accompany me?'
Peering down into the darkness, you make out smoke from the various Orc camps below
This is a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> down into the Deepscrave
